text: Nabiyow ama Qhuraan “Qajam”afat (Qarab-af akke waa afat) kaa haynaamal, aayoota kaak macah baxxaqsime wayteeh ni- afat? Qhuraan qajamaay, Nabii qarabtoytaa? Axcuk yenen. Keenik ixxic nabiyow; ama Qhuraan yeemene marah tirtooy, diwá. Kaadu kaa nummaysewee marak aytiital gibda keenik taniih, usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) ken sorkocô baxittel inti sinnaay diteey, tirri kaal miyyan. Woo korosuy Qhuraan nummayse wayte, xer- ikkek kah seecan maray ken kah seecaanam aabbe waah inna kinni
